game: Support the DevelopersA Support the Developers version will be available for purchase at release. This will include pre-production content such as sequence animatics unused animations and more!About the Game"ENA! We've got work to do so quit daydreaming and pay attention! And don't you DARE get involved in any shenanigans along the way... got it?!!"The first interactive adventure of the ENA series by Joel G.Play as ENA as she searches for the Boss that everyone wants to be. Explore strange worlds take on side gigs and meet both sweet and sour characters along the journey.There is a lot to encounter on your adventures:Explore new environments filled with hidden secrets and oddities.Meet different characters who only want you to do things for them.Use strange Tools to solve unusual problems.Live the experience of being the least popular person at any party.Disclaimers:This game contains sections with flashing lights and images that may induce seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy.This game contains visuals and language that some individuals may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.
